Package com.metal.kit.vapor

Class PlayerTest

java.lang.Object
com.metal.kit.vapor.PlayerTest
public class PlayerTest extends Object
Unit test class for testing the behavior of the Player class. This class uses JUnit 5 and Mockito for mocking dependencies such as the map, sprite, and input to test the player's movement, rendering, and death functionality.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerTest

      public PlayerTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach public void setUp()
      Sets up the test environment before each test method is executed. Initializes the player, mocked map, layers, sprite, and batch for the tests.

    • testPlayerRender

      @Test public void testPlayerRender()
      Tests the rendering behavior of the player. This test verifies that the player's sprite is drawn exactly once when the render method is called.

    • testMoveRight

      @Test public void testMoveRight()
      Tests the player's movement to the right. This test ensures that when the right arrow key is pressed, the player's X position is updated correctly based on the player's speed.

    • testMoveLeft

      @Test public void testMoveLeft()
      Tests the player's movement to the left. This test ensures that when the left arrow key is pressed, the player's X position is updated correctly, specifically moving the player by a fixed amount to the left.

    • testDie

      @Test public void testDie()
      Tests the player's death behavior. This test checks if the player's death prints the correct message to the console.
